product_name: The North Face Nuptse Hoodie Insulated Jacket - Infant Girls'
long_description: The North Face Nuptse Hoodie insulated jacket for infant girls outfits your little one in warmth, comfort and style when the cold winter months roll in. Recycled polyester shell offers downproof, water- and abrasion-resistant performance; downproof recycled polyester lining slides easily over clothing. Premium 550-fill-power goose down lofts and compresses for warmth with minimal weight. Sewn-through construction helps keep down from shifting to reduce cold spots; reinforced stitching in high-stress areas adds durability. Elastic binding at sleeves.
short_description: The North Face Nuptse Hoodie insulated jacket for infant girls outfits your little one in warmth, comfort and style when the cold winter months roll in.
subcategory: Rainwear And Outerwear -- Infants And Toddlers
product_group: Infants And Toddlers Insulated Parkas And Pants
